page.title: 01BROADTOWN AREA...SUMMARY.
page.content: Our block is centred on the Wiltshire village of BroadTown which stretches for about 2 miles along the B.4041 Wootton Bassett to Marlborough road. The village, together with a number of hamlets, nestles at the foot of a ridge of hills running east-west & are on the edge of the Marlborough downs. The area is a rural one with a number of farms concerned with dairying or beef fattening.Presently most people work in or around Swindon...a minority are employed on local farms.Amenities are few...there are no shops or even a post office.The church & school were built just over 100 years ago. Walking or horse riding on footpaths & bridleways over the fields or along the hills provide leisure opportunities for residents or visitors.
